;Syntax

: <code>getchunks <''dimension: string''></code>

Example usage:

getchunks overworld

Returns an array of arrays. Each of the arrays contains an x and z coordinate.

e.g.

[\n' +

      '   [ 80, -3 ],\n' + 

      '   [ 3, -4 ],\n' +  

      '   [ 78, -3 ],\n' + 

      '   [ 77, 6 ],\n' +  

      '   [ 76, -4 ],\n' + <!-- please retain double newline above for section differentiation -->
